Module.Content: <FORM> <INPUT type="button" value="Add Quotes" onClick="window.open('https://sites.google.com/site/fjampages/add-quotes-to-messages','mywindow','width=800,height=400')"> <INPUT type="button" value="Add Quotes" onClick="window.open('https://sites.google.com/site/fjampages/smilies-page-1','mywindow','width=200,height=600',scrollbars=yes)"> </FORM>
